languages.text: "Вот оно — истинное лицо Темных. Ты разозлил{mf||а} ее достаточно, чтобы она сбросила маску — и обнажила лик чудовища!"

traits.locale_text: "Вот оно — истинное лицо Темных. Ты разозлил ее достаточно, чтобы она сбросила маску — и обнажила лик чудовища!"

languages.text: "This is it — the true face of the Dark Ones. Her anger at you is so great that she has shed her mask — and revealed the beast beneath!"
languages.original_text: "Вот оно — истинное лицо Темных. Ты разозлил{mf||а} ее достаточно, чтобы она сбросила маску — и обнажила лик чудовища!"

traits.locale_text: "This is it — the true face of the Dark Ones. Her anger at you is so great that she has shed her mask — and revealed the beast beneath!"
"This is it — the true face of the Dark Ones. Her anger at you is so great that she has shed her mask — and revealed the beast beneath!"
"This is it — the true face of the Dark Ones. Her anger at you is so great that she has shed her mask — and revealed the beast beneath!"
"This is it — the true face of the Dark Ones. Her anger at you is so great that she has shed her mask — and revealed the beast beneath!"
"This is it — the true face of the Dark Ones. Her anger at you is so great that she has shed her mask — and revealed the beast beneath!"
"This is it — the true face of the Dark Ones. Her anger at you is so great that she has shed her mask — and revealed the beast beneath!"

languages.text: « Voyez ? Voilà le vrai visage des siens. Sa haine à votre égard est telle qu'elle a jeté le masque, révélant le monstre tapi dessous... »
languages.original_text: "This is it — the true face of the Dark Ones. Her anger at you is so great that she has shed her mask — and revealed the beast beneath!"

traits.locale_text: « Voyez ? Voilà le vrai visage des siens. Sa haine à votre égard est telle qu'elle a jeté le masque, révélant le monstre tapi dessous... »

languages.text: “是啊，这就是黑暗子嗣真正的嘴脸。看看她气急败坏到了什么程度，已经顾不上伪装，直接把自己的禽兽本性暴露出来了！”
languages.original_text: "This is it — the true face of the Dark Ones. Her anger at you is so great that she has shed her mask — and revealed the beast beneath!"

traits.locale_text: “是啊，这就是黑暗子嗣真正的嘴脸。看看她气急败坏到了什么程度，已经顾不上伪装，直接把自己的禽兽本性暴露出来了！”

languages.text: "Das ist es — das wahre Gesicht der Dunklen. Ihr Zorn auf Euch ist so groß, dass sie ihre Maske abgelegt hat — und das Monstrum darunter offenbart!"
languages.original_text: "This is it — the true face of the Dark Ones. Her anger at you is so great that she has shed her mask — and revealed the beast beneath!"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist es — das wahre Gesicht der Dunklen. Ihr Zorn auf Euch ist so groß, dass sie ihre Maske abgelegt hat — und das Monstrum darunter offenbart!"

languages.text: «Esta es la verdadera cara de los Oscuros. ¡Profesa tanto odio hacia ti que se ha quitado la máscara y revelado la bestia que se oculta detrás!».
languages.original_text: "This is it — the true face of the Dark Ones. Her anger at you is so great that she has shed her mask — and revealed the beast beneath!"

traits.locale_text: «Esta es la verdadera cara de los Oscuros. ¡Profesa tanto odio hacia ti que se ha quitado la máscara y revelado la bestia que se oculta detrás!».

languages.text: 「出たな…暗黒の者の真の顔が。あの御方の貴様に対する怒りはとても大きく、その仮面を脱ぎ捨て…仮面の下の野獣を曝け出したのだ！」
languages.original_text: "This is it — the true face of the Dark Ones. Her anger at you is so great that she has shed her mask — and revealed the beast beneath!"

traits.locale_text: 「出たな…暗黒の者の真の顔が。あの御方の貴様に対する怒りはとても大きく、その仮面を脱ぎ捨て…仮面の下の野獣を曝け出したのだ！」

languages.text: "Bak işte, Karalar gerçek yüzünü gösteriyor. Senden öylesine nefret ediyor ki maskesi düştü, altındaki canavar ortaya çıktı!"
languages.original_text: "This is it — the true face of the Dark Ones. Her anger at you is so great that she has shed her mask — and revealed the beast beneath!"

traits.locale_text: "İşte, Karalar gerçek yüzünü gösteriyor. Senden öylesine nefret ediyor ki maskesi düştü, altındaki canavar ortaya çıktı!"
